title: This Tiny Perfect World
description: A contemporary “clean teen” coming-of-age story about a small-town girl who opens her eyes to life’s endless possibilitiesWhen Penny wins a scholarship to a prestigious theater camp, she thinks it’s the start of a perfect summer. But when she arrives at camp, Penny is thrust into a world of competition and self-doubt. And as she meets new friends, including Chase, a talented young actor with big-city dreams, she begins to realize that her own dreams may be bigger than she ever imagined.
author: Lauren Gibaldi
